OOC: True, in the cartoon continuity, the Quintessons created the 
Transformers, but Beast Wars is a slight fusion of continuity.  They never 
mention the Quintessons, but someone saying, "By Primus" is a very common 
thing. Another thing, they call the Autobot ship the Ark, like in the comics, 
not Autobot Headquarters, like in the cartoon.

--part1_38.174841d8.285214b0_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>OOC: True, in the cartoon continuity, the Quintessons created the 
<BR>Transformers, but Beast Wars is a slight fusion of continuity.  They never 
<BR>mention the Quintessons, but someone saying, "By Primus" is a very common 
<BR>thing. Another thing, they call the Autobot ship the Ark, like in the comics, 
<BR>not Autobot Headquarters, like in the cartoon.</FONT></HTML>

--part1_38.174841d8.285214b0_boundary--
